SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class LogsHandler

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.LogsHandler
public class LogsHandler extends Object
Handler for searching log files.

This class provides functionality to search log files for matching query strings. It dynamically discovers log file paths and date formats from log4j2 configuration.

  • Method Details

    • searchLogs

      public String searchLogs(String query) throws LogsHandler.LogsSearchException
      Searches current and previous log files for lines matching the query string.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query string.
      Returns:
      Search results containing matching log lines, or null if an error occurred.
      Throws:
      LogsHandler.LogsSearchException - if unable to determine log file configuration or search fails.

    • getLogFilePatternFromLog4j2

      private String getLogFilePatternFromLog4j2()
      Gets the log file pattern from log4j2 configuration by examining appenders.
      Returns:
      The log file pattern (e.g., "/var/log/robin-%d{yyyyMMdd}.log") or null if not found.

    • extractDateFormatFromPattern

      private String extractDateFormatFromPattern(String filePattern)
      Extracts the date format from a log4j2 file pattern.

      For example, extracts "yyyyMMdd" from "/var/log/robin-%d{yyyyMMdd}.log"

      Parameters:
      filePattern - The log file pattern from log4j2 configuration.
      Returns:
      The date format string (e.g., "yyyyMMdd") or null if not found.

    • searchLogFile

      private int searchLogFile(String logFilePath, String query, StringBuilder results)
      Searches a log file for lines matching the query string.
      Parameters:
      logFilePath - Path to the log file.
      query - Query string to search for.
      results - StringBuilder to append matching lines to.
      Returns:
      Number of matches found.
